traffic signs.description: Orange and white traffic barricades are positioned to block entry, arranged diagonally across the junction ahead on the right-hand side
traffic signs.explanation: These barricades indicate that there is roadwork or a closure ahead, preventing passage on that part of the road.

traffic lights.description: A traffic light to the right of the ego car is displaying a green signal
traffic lights.explanation: The green light indicates that the ego car has the right of way to proceed if it is safe to do so.

traffic cones.description: No traffic cones are visible in the image
traffic cones.explanation: Without cones, there is no indication of temporary changes to lane structure or minor road works.

barriers.description: A solid white fence is visible on the right, bordering the construction site, following the line of the barricades
barriers.explanation: This barrier suggests a delineation of the construction area from the road, likely contributing to the need for the mentioned barricades and road closure.

general_perception.description and explanation:
In the traffic image, there are no vehicles or vulnerable road users present. However, there are traffic signs, specifically orange and white traffic barricades, which are arranged diagonally across the junction ahead on the right-hand side. These barricades serve as an indication of roadwork or a closure, preventing passage on that part of the road. Additionally, there is a traffic light to the right of the ego car displaying a green signal, which means the ego car has the right of way to proceed if it is safe to do so.

There are no traffic cones in the image, which implies there are no temporary changes to lane structure or minor road works indicated. A solid white fence is also visible on the right, bordering the construction site and following the line of the barricades. This barrier delineates the construction area from the road and likely contributes to the need for the barricades and the road closure. No other objects are reported in the image.

1.description and explanation: This is a traffic sign prominently displaying an arrow pointing left. It indicates a mandatory direction for vehicles to follow, specifically that vehicles must turn left ahead. This sign directly influences the driving behavior of the ego car by indicating the required maneuver at the upcoming intersection, ensuring that the driver prepares to make a left turn as dictated by the sign.

2.description and explanation: The object is a traffic sign mounted on a pole, featuring a yellow and black design indicating a caution or warning, likely for a sharp turn or merging roads ahead. The sign serves as a crucial element for the ego car, guiding the driver to adjust speed and driving behavior appropriately to handle the road condition safely.

driving_suggestion: Given the open lane to the left and the green traffic signal, the ego car should proceed with caution, staying alert for potential instructions around the construction area indicated by the barricades. Any posted or temporary signs around the construction zone should be followed to navigate safely around it. The closed lane on the right should be avoided as indicated by the barricades.
